result.name: modelled-gridded-data-of-aquaculture-suitability-in-the-dorset-east-devon-fisheries-l-2018-2019
result.notes:
Modelled raster layers (GeoTiff format) of aquaculture suitability with values 
ranging between 0 and 1, where the value 0 represents unsuitable and 1 fully 
suitable. Gridded data (GeoTiff format) produced in the context of the FLAG 
Aquaculture Mapping project (2018-2019).

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.

result.title: Modelled gridded data of aquaculture suitability in the Dorset & East Devon Fisheries Local Action Group area, 2018-2019
